keyMoments.title: First Mention in Anime
keyMoments.description: Momonosuke is mentioned by a girl who saw a child turn into a dragon in the Secret Room. This marks his first reference in the anime.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Momonosuke's importance to the Punk Hazard arc and his connection to the artificial Devil Fruit experiments.
keyMoments.quote: I peeked into the Secret Room and kept it to myself. I'm worried for Momonosuke!

reveals.information: First mentioned as a child who turned into a dragon

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Luffy Begins
keyMoments.description: Monet confronts Luffy and uses her Kamakura Jussoshi technique to trap him in a ten-layered snow hut barrier.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Monet's tactical approach to combat and her role as a delaying force.
keyMoments.quote: Ten layers cannot be easily broken!

keyMoments.title: Freezing Embrace Attack
keyMoments.description: Monet uses her snow-covered wings to hug Luffy, draining his warmth and strength to nearly kill him through hypothermia.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Monet uses her Logia powers strategically rather than relying on brute force.
keyMoments.quote: You cannot beat me, but don't confuse victory with fighting ability.

keyMoments.title: Kamakura Jussoshi Technique
keyMoments.description: Monet demonstrates her ten-layered snow hut technique, showcasing her mastery of the Yuki Yuki no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a new combat technique unique to Monet's fighting style.

abilities.description: Monet creates a ten-layered snow hut barrier that only she can pass through as a Logia user.
Monet hugs her opponent with her snow-covered wings, draining their body heat and strength.

reveals.information: Openly acknowledges her role is to delay, not defeat opponents

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Jet Spear
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his Jet Spear technique, breaking through Monet's attack and the floor beneath him.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new Gear Second technique to Luffy's arsenal.

keyMoments.title: Falls into Garbage Disposal
keyMoments.description: After breaking the floor, Luffy falls into the facility's garbage disposal system.
keyMoments.significance: Separates Luffy from the main conflict and sets up new encounters.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches his arms backward and thrusts them forward in a spear-like motion at high speed using Gear Second.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Brutally Tortured by Vergo
keyMoments.description: Law is tortured by Vergo who squeezes his disembodied heart and delivers Haki-enhanced attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's vulnerability when separated from his heart and Vergo's ruthless nature.

keyMoments.title: Uses Counter Shock on Vergo
keyMoments.description: Despite his injuries, Law grabs Vergo and uses Counter Shock, sending electrical surges through his body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's determination and combat abilities even when at a severe disadvantage.

abilities.description: Law grabs his opponent and sends a large electrical surge through their body.

reveals.information: Law's separated heart makes him extremely vulnerable to attacks

keyMoments.title: Tortures Law
keyMoments.description: Vergo brutally tortures Law by squeezing his heart and delivering devastating Haki-enhanced attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Vergo as a formidable and ruthless opponent.

keyMoments.title: Full-Body Haki Display
keyMoments.description: Vergo demonstrates his advanced Busoshoku Haki by hardening his entire arm and bamboo stick.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vergo as one of the most proficient Haki users at this point in the series.

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Smoker
keyMoments.description: After nearly killing Law, Smoker arrives to confront Vergo.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the battle between two Vice-Admirals and highlights Vergo's betrayal.

abilities.description: Vergo can harden his entire body with Busoshoku Haki, providing exceptional offense and defense.
Vergo imbues his bamboo stick with Busoshoku Haki to deliver devastating strikes.

reveals.information: Can harden his entire arm and weapon with advanced Armament Haki

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Monster Point Struggles
keyMoments.description: Chopper uses Monster Point to restrain the children non-violently but fails when his transformation wears off.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's compassion and the moral dilemma of helping the drug-affected children.
keyMoments.quote: I can't lay a finger on them! Caesar is trying to make them into big violent fighters!

keyMoments.title: Protects the Candy
keyMoments.description: Mocha, having regained her sanity, runs away with the dangerous candy to protect the other children from consuming more.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Mocha's bravery and the possibility of recovery from Caesar's drug.
keyMoments.quote: Don't eat it! It's evil candy! Chopper is trying to help us. If you don't listen, we won't be able to go home!

reveals.information: Has developed resistance to the NHC10 drug

keyMoments.title: Confronts Vergo
keyMoments.description: Smoker arrives at the SAD Production room to confront his former colleague and fellow Vice-Admiral Vergo.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the confrontation between two Vice-Admirals and highlights the betrayal within the Marines.
